description:
Movie adaptation #2 of Toro Toro Resistance`s popular game "Monmusu Quest"!
While staying loyal to the theme of reverse r*pe by female monsters, 
this animation has added new original stories not found in the game! 
Source: dlsite.com

titles.title: Minagi: The Great Harlot of Babylon
魅凪・バビロンの大淫婦
